meanings.definition: Each of two parts into which a thing is or can be divided.
meanings.sent1: The cake was cut into two moieties for the siblings to share.
meanings.sent2: The moieties of the puzzle fit perfectly together to reveal the picture.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the moieties of the pizza disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The moieties of the team worked together seamlessly to achieve victory.
meanings.sent5: The moieties of the necklace were like two halves of a heart, completing each other.

meanings.definition: A part or portion of something shared with another or others.
meanings.sent1: She offered one of the moieties of her sandwich to her friend.
meanings.sent2: The moieties of the responsibility were divided equally among the group.
meanings.sent3: The moieties of the secret were whispered between the two friends.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like the moieties of a coin, always together.
meanings.sent5: The moieties of the treasure map led to a hidden chest filled with gold.
